title: ettanaiyO murai
sahitya:
ettanaiyO murai iTTazhaittAlum un idayam kuzhayAdO sAmi


anupallavi

  niddiraiyilum inda cittak-kuyil unnai ninaittu neTTuyirppadai manattavA kANAyO


caraNam    ninaivugaL yAvaiyum kanavu siragaDittu ninniDam varat-tAvumE
nikhilANDa nAyakA nin sharaNenrE nenjak-kiLi kUvumE
unai alankarittiDum vanamalar mAlaigaL udirndu vADik-kuviyumE
Urvalam sheidiDum kArkAlat-tErilE uTren kavalai tIra shaTraruL paramanE
